name: The Forest Spirit [Prototype]
description:
In our small Prototype: The Forest Spirit you play as Merra, it is your job as the last protector of the Forest is to cleanse a long-forgotten corruption, an “unknown energy” that has corrupted the mystic valley of these lands and has returned to consume all.

Features (so far)

  • 1 Level.
  • 2 enemy types.
  • First person combat.
  • 2 Simple Puzzles.
  • 2 Unique Spells.

Note: This game is a prototype for Windows, and we are testing our prototype for Market viability, manly we are testing the First-person Shooter and Puzzle aspects of this prototype. 

Should you enjoy our game, please give us feedback on what you like (and/or dislike), we would appreciate & accept all feedback that will help us improve.

Click here for survey
